title: Morning Stretch
description: After Fajr, perform a 5-10 minute stretching routine to wake up your body and improve circulation.

title: Evening Walk
description: After Maghrib, take a 15-20 minute light walk to aid digestion and maintain energy levels.

title: Short Bodyweight Exercises
description: Do squats, push-ups, and planks for 10-15 minutes during non-fasting hours to stay active.

title: Deep Breathing & Relaxation
description: Practice deep breathing or meditation for 5 minutes to reduce stress and stay focused during fasting.
